sql.query: select land_measurement,loan_amtreqd from loandetails where loan_appno = '^'
select NVL(max(land_id),0) as maxid from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^'

insert into agr_landholdings(LAND_APPID, land_id, land_apptype, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security, land_fruit, land_nonfruit, land_datemortgage, LAND_IRRIGSIZE,LAND_NONIRRIGA,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE,LAND_CULTIVATABLE,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY,LAND_LLF_TYPE) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

update agr_landholdings set land_apptype=?, land_acreage=?, land_village=?, land_taluk=?, land_district=?, land_survey=?, land_revenue=?, land_value=?, land_owned_leased=?, land_leaseperiod=?, land_rent_repay=?, land_irrigated=?, land_which_irrigated=?, land_source=?, land_encumbrance=?, land_Encroached_Land=?, land_farmdistance=?, land_housedistance=?, land_landlorddetails=?, land_acreage1=?, land_mortgage=?, land_security=?, land_fruit=?, land_nonfruit=?, land_datemortgage=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),LAND_IRRIGSIZE=?, LAND_NONIRRIGA=?,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE=?,LAND_CULTIVATABLE=?,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY=?,LAND_LLF_TYPE=? where LAND_APPID=? and land_id=?
delete from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID=? and land_id=?

select LAND_APPID, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security, land_fruit, land_nonfruit, to_char(land_datemortgage,'DD/MM/YYYY') as land_datemortgage,LAND_IRRIGSIZE,LAND_NONIRRIGA,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE, LAND_CULTIVATABLE,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY,LAND_LLF_TYPE from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^'

select LAND_APPID, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source,land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security,land_fruit, land_nonfruit, to_char(land_datemortgage,'DD/MM/YYYY') as land_datemortgage,LAND_IRRIGSIZE,LAND_NONIRRIGA,LAND_NONCULTIVATABLE, LAND_CULTIVATABLE,LAND_FARMERCATEGORY from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^' and land_id='^'

select LAND_APPID, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue,land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security, land_fruit, land_nonfruit, to_char(land_datemortgage,'DD/MM/YYYY') as land_datemortgage from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^'

select land_appno, land_apptype, land_id, land_nature, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1, land_mortgage, land_security from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_security='1'

select land_appno, land_apptype, land_id, land_nature, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_owned_leased='2'

select land_appno, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_mortgage, land_security, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_mortgage='2'

select land_appno, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue,land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails, land_mortgage, land_security, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_mortgage='1'

select land_appno, land_apptype, land_id, land_acreage, land_village, land_taluk, land_district, land_survey, land_revenue, land_value, land_owned_leased, land_leaseperiod, land_rent_repay, land_irrigated, land_which_irrigated, land_source, land_encumbrance, land_Encroached_Land, land_farmdistance, land_housedistance, land_landlorddetails ,land_mortgage,land_security,land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_mortgage='3'
select sum(land_revenue) as landrevenue from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_apptype like 'a%'
select sum(land_acreage) as tot_acerage, sum(land_acreage1) as tot_acerage1 from agr_landholdings where LAND_APPID='^'
select land_appno, land_apptype, land_acreage, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where (land_apptype like ('a%') or land_apptype like ('c%')) and land_appno='^'
select land_acreage, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_irrigated='1' and (land_apptype like ('a%') or land_apptype like ('c%')) and land_appno='^'
select land_acreage, land_acreage1 from agr_landholdings where land_irrigated !='1' and (land_apptype like ('a%') or land_apptype like ('c%')) and land_appno='^'

select sum(LAND_ACREAGE) as acre,sum(LAND_ACREAGE1) as gunthacents,sum(land_value) as value from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_irrigated='^' and (land_apptype like ('a%') or land_apptype like ('c%'))
select sum(land_acreage) as tot_acerage, sum(land_acreage1) as tot_acerage1 from agr_landholdings where land_appno='^' and land_apptype='^'

select appno,tech_grown, tech_facilities, tech_adequate, tech_supply, tech_produce, tech_barns, tech_dimensions, tech_loc,tech_bran, tech_credit, tech_fact, tech_agree, tech_agreeno, TO_CHAR(tech_receivedRH,'DD/MM/YYYY')as tech_receivedRH, tech_address, tech_ugc from agr_techdetails where appno='^'

insert into agr_techdetails( appno, tech_grown, tech_facilities, tech_adequate, tech_supply, tech_produce, tech_barns, tech_dimensions, tech_loc, tech_bran, tech_credit, tech_fact, tech_agree, tech_agreeno, tech_receivedRH, tech_address, tech_ugc)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, ?)
delete from agr_techdetails where appno=?
select seqno, appno, sno, crop_type, crop_activity, crop_units, crop_particulars, crop_requirements, crop_totamtWC, crop_roiWC, crop_repayWC from agr_capitaldetails where appno='^' order by seqno
delete from agr_capitaldetails where appno=?
select NVL(max(seqno),0)+1 as maxid from agr_capitaldetails
insert into agr_capitaldetails(seqno, appno, sno, crop_type, crop_activity, crop_units, crop_particulars, crop_requirements, crop_totamtWC, crop_roiWC, crop_repayWC) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select appno, slno, agr_particulars, agr_animal, agr_costperanimal, agr_workingcapital, agr_areabenefit, agr_dimention, agr_volume, agr_estimatedcost, agr_margin, agr_grossincome, agr_totalexpenditure, agr_termtype, agr_totestimate, agr_totmargin, agr_roiTL, agr_repayTL,agr_payment,agr_installment, TO_CHAR(agr_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as agr_date,agr_holiday from agr_termloans where appno ='^' order by to_number(slno)

insert into agr_termloans (appno, agr_particulars, agr_animal, agr_costperanimal, agr_workingcapital, agr_areabenefit, agr_dimention, agr_volume, agr_estimatedcost, agr_margin, agr_grossincome, agr_totalexpenditure, agr_termtype, agr_totestimate, agr_totmargin, agr_roiTL, agr_repayTL, agr_payment,agr_installment,agr_date,agr_holiday,slno) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?)
insert into agr_grossdata(appno, apptype, appid, year1, year2, year3, grossinc1, grossinc2, grossinc3)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from agr_grossdata where appno=? and apptype=?
select year1,year2,year3,grossinc1,grossinc2,grossinc3 from agr_grossdata where appno='^' and apptype='^'
select NVL(max(crop_slno),0) as maxid from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^'

insert into agr_cropdetails(crop_appno, crop_type, crop_slno, crop_season, crop_area, crop_avg_yeild, crop_cost_cult, crop_gross_income, crop_net_income, crop_season1, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_total_area, crop_value, crop_sowing, crop_harvesting) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update agr_cropdetails set crop_type=?, crop_season=?, crop_area=?, crop_avg_yeild=?, crop_cost_cult=? ,crop_gross_income=?, crop_net_income=?, crop_season1=?, crop_irrigated=?, crop_irrigated_amt=?, crop_acre=?, crop_total_area=?, crop_value=?, crop_sowing=?, crop_harvesting=? where crop_appno=? and crop_slno=?
delete from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno=? and crop_slno=? and crop_type=?
select count(crop_year)as crop_year from agr_cropdetails where crop_type='^' and crop_year='^' and crop_appno='^'
select sum(crop_net_income)as crop_net_income from agr_cropdetails where crop_type='^' and crop_year='^' and crop_appno='^'

select crop_appno, crop_type, crop_slno, crop_season, crop_area, crop_avg_yeild, crop_cost_cult, crop_gross_income, crop_net_income, crop_year, crop_household, crop_season1, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_total_area, crop_value, crop_cost, crop_sowing, crop_harvesting from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='^'
select crop_area,crop_acre from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='1'
select crop_area,crop_acre from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='2'
select crop_area,crop_acre from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='3'
select crop_area,crop_acre from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='4'
select crop_area,crop_acre from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='5'

select crop_season, crop_season1, crop_total_area, crop_cost_cult, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_avg_yeild, crop_value, crop_cost, crop_area from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='1'

select crop_season, crop_season1, crop_total_area, crop_cost_cult, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_avg_yeild,crop_value,crop_cost,crop_area from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='2'

select crop_season, crop_season1, crop_total_area, crop_cost_cult, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_avg_yeild, crop_value, crop_cost, crop_area from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='3'

select crop_season, crop_season1, crop_total_area, crop_cost_cult, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_avg_yeild, crop_value, crop_cost, crop_area from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='4'

select crop_season, crop_season1, crop_total_area, crop_cost_cult, crop_irrigated, crop_irrigated_amt, crop_acre, crop_avg_yeild,crop_value,crop_cost,crop_area from agr_cropdetails where crop_appno='^' and crop_type='PO' and crop_season1='5'
select * from agr_product_margin where appno='^'
delete from agr_product_margin where appno=?
update agr_product_margin set live_margin=?, poultry_margin=?, machinary_margin=?, other_margin=? where appno=?
insert into agr_product_margin(appno, live_margin, poultry_margin, machinary_margin, other_margin) values(?,?,?,?,?)

insert into pre_sanction_report1(pre_appno, pre_id, pre_refno, pre_date, pre_sanctionamount, pre_purpose, pre_sanctionauthority, pre_amountdisbursed, pre_disbursedate, pre_outstandamount, pre_amountoverdue, pre_acountregular, pre_irregualdetail, pre_termcond,pre_inwardno) values(?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

update pre_sanction_report1 set pre_refno=?, pre_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), pre_sanctionamount=?, pre_purpose=?, pre_sanctionauthority=?, pre_amountdisbursed=?, pre_disbursedate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), pre_outstandamount=?, pre_amountoverdue=?, pre_acountregular=?, pre_irregualdetail=?, pre_termcond=? where pre_appno=? and pre_id=?

update pre_sanction_report1 set pre_refno=?, pre_date=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), pre_sanctionamount=?, pre_purpose=?, pre_sanctionauthority=?, pre_amountdisbursed=?, pre_disbursedate=TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), pre_outstandamount=?, pre_amountoverdue=?, pre_acountregular=?, pre_irregualdetail=?, pre_termcond=? where pre_inwardno=? and pre_id=?

select pre_appno, pre_id, pre_refno, to_char(pre_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_date, pre_sanctionamount, pre_purpose, pre_sanctionauthority, pre_amountdisbursed, to_char(pre_disbursedate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_disbursedate, pre_outstandamount, pre_amountoverdue, pre_acountregular, pre_irregualdetail, pre_termcond,pre_inwardno from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_appno='^'and pre_id='^'

select pre_appno, pre_id, pre_refno, to_char(pre_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_date, pre_sanctionamount, pre_purpose, pre_sanctionauthority, pre_amountdisbursed, to_char(pre_disbursedate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_disbursedate, pre_outstandamount, pre_amountoverdue, pre_acountregular, pre_irregualdetail, pre_termcond,pre_inwardno from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_inwardno='^'and pre_id='^'

select pre_appno, pre_id, pre_refno, to_char(pre_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_date, pre_sanctionamount, pre_purpose, pre_sanctionauthority, pre_amountdisbursed, to_char(pre_disbursedate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_disbursedate, pre_outstandamount, pre_amountoverdue, pre_acountregular, pre_irregualdetail, pre_termcond from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_appno='^'

select pre_appno, pre_id, pre_refno, to_char(pre_date,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_date, pre_sanctionamount, pre_purpose, pre_sanctionauthority, pre_amountdisbursed, to_char(pre_disbursedate,'DD/MM/YYYY')as pre_disbursedate, pre_outstandamount, pre_amountoverdue, pre_acountregular, pre_irregualdetail, pre_termcond from pre_sanction_report1 where PRE_INWARDNO='^'
delete from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_appno=? and pre_id=?
delete from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_inwardno=? and pre_id=?
select NVL(max(pre_id),0) as maxid from pre_sanction_report1
select pre_id,pre_refno from pre_sanction_report1 where pre_appno='^' order by pre_id
select pre_id,pre_refno from pre_sanction_report1 where PRE_INWARDNO='^' order by pre_id

update pre_sanction_report set other_family_members=?, present_income_source=?, other_information=?, land_particulars=?, water_avail_details=?,benefit_area=?,crops_details=?,asset_details=?,liability_details=?,sanction_ref_no=?,sanction_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),sanction_amount=?,loan_purpose=?,sanction_authority=?,disbursed_amount=?,disbursement_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),outstanding_amount=?,overdue_amount=?,regular_account=?,irregular_details=?,terms_cond_complied=?,applicant_arrangements=?,recommendation=?,inspection_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,SEL_BORROWER=?, SEL_MAP=?, TXR_EAST=?, TXR_WEST=?, TXR_NORTH=?, TXR_SOUTH=?, SEL_CONSTRUCTION=?, pre_selexilimit=?,nameofinsp=?,panum=? where appno=?

update pre_sanction_report set other_family_members=?, present_income_source=?, other_information=?, land_particulars=?, water_avail_details=?,benefit_area=?,crops_details=?,asset_details=?,liability_details=?,sanction_ref_no=?,sanction_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),sanction_amount=?,loan_purpose=?,sanction_authority=?,disbursed_amount=?,disbursement_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),outstanding_amount=?,overdue_amount=?,regular_account=?,irregular_details=?,terms_cond_complied=?,applicant_arrangements=?,recommendation=?,inspection_date=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') ,SEL_BORROWER=?, SEL_MAP=?, TXR_EAST=?, TXR_WEST=?, TXR_NORTH=?, TXR_SOUTH=?, SEL_CONSTRUCTION=?, pre_selexilimit=?,nameofinsp=?,panum=? where pre_inwardno=?

INSERT INTO PRE_SANCTION_REPORT(APPNO, OTHER_FAMILY_MEMBERS, PRESENT_INCOME_SOURCE, OTHER_INFORMATION, LAND_PARTICULARS,WATER_AVAIL_DETAILS,BENEFIT_AREA,CROPS_DETAILS,ASSET_DETAILS,LIABILITY_DETAILS,APPLICANT_ARRANGEMENTS,RECOMMENDATION,INSPECTION_DATE, SEL_BORROWER, SEL_MAP, TXR_EAST, TXR_WEST,TXR_NORTH, TXR_SOUTH, SEL_CONSTRUCTION, pre_selexilimit, nameofinsp,panum,pre_inwardno) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from pre_sanction_report where appno=?
delete from pre_sanction_report where pre_inwardno=?

select APPNO, OTHER_FAMILY_MEMBERS, PRESENT_INCOME_SOURCE, OTHER_INFORMATION, LAND_PARTICULARS, WATER_AVAIL_DETAILS, BENEFIT_AREA, CROPS_DETAILS, ASSET_DETAILS, LIABILITY_DETAILS, APPLICANT_ARRANGEMENTS, RECOMMENDATION, to_char(INSPECTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as INSPECTION_DATE, SEL_BORROWER, SEL_MAP, TXR_EAST, TXR_WEST, TXR_NORTH, TXR_SOUTH, SEL_CONSTRUCTION, pre_selexilimit, nameofinsp, panum,pre_inwardno from pre_sanction_report where appno='^'

select APPNO, OTHER_FAMILY_MEMBERS, PRESENT_INCOME_SOURCE, OTHER_INFORMATION, LAND_PARTICULARS, WATER_AVAIL_DETAILS, BENEFIT_AREA, CROPS_DETAILS, ASSET_DETAILS, LIABILITY_DETAILS, APPLICANT_ARRANGEMENTS, RECOMMENDATION, to_char(INSPECTION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as INSPECTION_DATE, SEL_BORROWER, SEL_MAP, TXR_EAST, TXR_WEST, TXR_NORTH, TXR_SOUTH, SEL_CONSTRUCTION, pre_selexilimit, nameofinsp, panum,pre_inwardno from pre_sanction_report where pre_inwardno='^'
select agr_crop_appno, agr_crop_sino, agr_preirrigated, agr_preunirrigated, agr_pretotal, agr_postirrigated, agr_postunirrigated, agr_posttotal from agr_croppattern where agr_crop_appno='^'
insert into agr_croppattern(agr_crop_appno, agr_crop_sino, agr_preirrigated, agr_preunirrigated, agr_pretotal, agr_postirrigated, agr_postunirrigated, agr_posttotal) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update agr_croppattern set agr_preirrigated=?, agr_preunirrigated=?, agr_pretotal=?, agr_postirrigated=?, agr_postunirrigated=?, agr_posttotal=? where agr_crop_sino=? and agr_crop_appno=?
delete from agr_croppattern where agr_crop_appno=?

INSERT INTO agr_Consumptionloan(AGR_CONS_APPNO, AGR_PATIENTNAME, AGR_DOCNAME, AGR_CHILDNAME, AGR_CLASS, AGR_YEAROFSTUDY, AGR_SCHOOL, AGR_BRIDENAME, AGR_BRIDEGROOMNAME, AGR_MARRPLACE, AGR_MARRDATE, AGR_DECEASED, AGR_NEWBORNCHILD, AGE_CEREMONYNAME, AGR_CEREMONYDATE, AGR_FININSTITUTION, AGR_OURBANK) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?, TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?)

insert into agr_economics(econo_appno, agr_hull, agr_engine, agr_rope, agr_accessories, agr_capitaltot, agr_sal, agr_oil, agr_mis, agr_depreciation, agr_insurance, agr_exptot1, agr_prawns, agr_pfish, agr_tfish, agr_incometot1, agr_lexp, agr_incometot2, agr_fingerlings, agr_miscellaneous, agr_exptot2, agr_saleoffish, agr_lexp1, agr_surplus, agr_rent, agr_feeding,agr_lprawns,agr_mprawns) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select AGR_CONS_APPNO, AGR_PATIENTNAME, AGR_DOCNAME, AGR_CHILDNAME, AGR_CLASS, TO_CHAR(AGR_YEAROFSTUDY,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS AGR_YEAROFSTUDY, AGR_SCHOOL, AGR_BRIDENAME, AGR_BRIDEGROOMNAME, AGR_MARRPLACE, TO_CHAR(AGR_MARRDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS AGR_MARRDATE, AGR_DECEASED, AGR_NEWBORNCHILD, AGE_CEREMONYNAME, TO_CHAR(AGR_CEREMONYDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS AGR_CEREMONYDATE, AGR_FININSTITUTION, AGR_OURBANK from agr_Consumptionloan where AGR_CONS_APPNO='^'

select * from (select b.facility_appno,b.FACILITY_SANCAMT,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, b.facility_category,b.facility_freshlimit,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_renew_flag,b.facility_sno,b.facility_existing,b.facility_headid,cd.fac_baseappno,cd.fac_baseappsno,'P' as facflag,facility_sancinterest from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd,comfacility_details cd where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and cd.fac_appno='^' and cd.fac_appsno='^' and cd.fac_proposaltype='P' and b.facility_appno=cd.fac_exappno and b.facility_sno=cd.fac_exappsno and (facility_sancstatus='A' or facility_sancstatus is null) union all select b.facility_appno,b.FACILITY_SANCAMT,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, b.facility_category,b.facility_freshlimit,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_renew_flag,b.facility_sno,b.facility_existing,b.facility_headid,cd.fac_baseappno,cd.fac_baseappsno,'' as facflag,facility_sancinterest from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd,comfacility_details cd where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and cd.fac_baseappno='^' and cd.fac_proposaltype='E' and b.facility_appno=cd.fac_exappno and b.facility_sno=cd.fac_exappsno and (facility_sancstatus='A' or facility_sancstatus is null) union all select b.facility_appno,b.FACILITY_SANCAMT,fc.com_facdesc,a.facility_for,STAT_DATA_DESC1 as facility_displaydesc, b.facility_category,b.facility_freshlimit,fc.com_headfac,b.facility_renew_flag,b.facility_sno,b.facility_existing,b.facility_headid,cd.FAC_APPNO,cd.FAC_SNO,'' as facflag,facility_sancinterest from facility_master a,facilities b ,facility_corp fc,static_data sd,facility_additionaldetails cd where STAT_DATA_DESC=b.facility_displaydesc and STAT_DATA_ID='180' and b.facility_headid =a.facility_catid and fc.com_facid=b.facility_code and cd.FAC_APPNO='^' and cd.FAC_SNO='^' and fac_renewalflag='R' and b.facility_appno=cd.FAC_ADDAPPNO and b.facility_sno=cd.FAC_ADDAPPSNO and (facility_sancstatus='A' or facility_sancstatus is null) ) order by decode(facility_headid,'4',1,'5',2,'3', 3,'2',4,'6',5,'7',6,'1',7)

insert into com_ksaeassessment(com_appno,com_sno,com_parameter,com_comments,com_eligible,com_eligiblebasedon,com_ksaeeligibleid,com_comments1)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select com_sno,sd2.STAT_DATA_DESC1 as question,com_comments,com_eligible,sd1.stat_data_desc as com_eligiblebasedon,sd2.stat_data_desc as com_ksaeeligibleid,sd2.stat_data_descvalue1,sd2.STAT_DATA_VALUEDESC,sd2.STATIC_DATA_GECLDESC,sd2.STATIC_DATA_MAXVAL,sd2.STATIC_DATA_SECTOR from static_data sd1,static_data sd2 left join com_ksaeassessment on com_appno='^' and com_eligiblebasedon=sd2.stat_data_desc where sd1.STAT_DATA_ID='233' and sd2.STAT_DATA_ID='234' and sd1.stat_data_desc=sd2.stat_data_value and sd2.STAT_DATA_ACTIVE='Y' and sd2.stat_data_value='^' and sd2.STATIC_DATA_GECLDESC ='^' order by sd2.STAT_DATA_SNO

select nvl(sum(loan_recmdamt),0) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,MIS_APPDETAILS m,applications a2 where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and a.app_no=m.app_no and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('op','pa') and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end) and a.app_delflag='N' and d.demo_type='a' and m.app_facility_sno='1' and m.APP_ACTIVITYCODE in (^)

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a,applications a2 where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('pa','op') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and (f.facility_sancstatus is null or f.facility_sancstatus='A') and f.facility_appno in (select app_no from MIS_APPDETAILS where APP_ACTIVITYCODE in (^) and app_facility_sno = f.facility_sno) and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end) and f.facility_code in (select com_facid from facility_corp where com_factype='F') group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin

select sum(loan_recmdamt) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,applications a2 where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('op','pa') and a.app_delflag!='Y' and d.demo_type='a' and a.APP_RENEW_STATUS is null and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end)

select nvl(sum(loan_recmdamt),0) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,mis_appclassification m,applications a2 where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and a.app_no=m.app_no and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and d.demo_type='a' and a.APP_RENEW_STATUS is null and m.app_facility_sno='1' and m.app_subsector in (^) and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end)

select nvl(sum(loan_recmdamt),0) as totallimit from loandetails l, applications a, perapplicant p, per_demographics d,mis_appclassification m,applications a2 where l.loan_appno=a.app_no and a.app_no=d.demo_appno and a.app_no=m.app_no and d.demo_appid=p.perapp_id and p.perapp_oldid='^' and a.app_status in('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and d.demo_type='a' and a.APP_RENEW_STATUS is null and m.app_facility_sno='1' and m.app_agriculture in (^) and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end)

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a,applications a2 where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('pa','op') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and (f.facility_sancstatus is null or f.facility_sancstatus='A') and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end) group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a,applications a2 where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('pa','op') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and (f.facility_sancstatus is null or f.facility_sancstatus='A') and f.facility_appno in (select app_no from mis_appclassification where app_subsector in (^) and app_facility_sno = f.facility_sno) and f.facility_code in (select com_facid from facility_corp where com_factype='F') and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end) group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin

select nvl(sum( case when (a.app_valuesin='R') then nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0) when (a.app_valuesin='L') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*100000) when (a.app_valuesin='C') then (nvl(sum(f.facility_sancamt),0)*10000000) end),0) as totallimit from facilities f , com_demographics cd , facility_corp fc, perapplicant pa , applications a,applications a2 where pa.perapp_id=cd.demo_comappid and perapp_oldid='^' and f.facility_appno=a.app_no and a.app_status in ('pa','op') and f.FACILITY_STATUS in ('op','pa') and a.app_delflag='N' and f.facility_renew is null and cd.demo_appno=a.app_no and fc.com_facid=f.facility_code and f.facility_group='0' and (f.facility_sancstatus is null or f.facility_sancstatus='A') and f.facility_appno in (select app_no from mis_appclassification where app_agriculture in (^) and app_facility_sno = f.facility_sno) and f.facility_code in (select com_facid from facility_corp where com_factype='F') and a2.app_no='^' and a.app_createdate <= (case when a2.app_status='op' then a2.app_createdate when a2.app_status='ol' then a2.app_createdate else a2.app_processdate end) group by a.app_no, a.app_valuesin

Select ACT_SCHEME,ACT_DESC,ACT_AVAILABLE,ACT_RANGEFROM,ACT_RANGETO,ACT_SNO,ACT_YEARS,ACT_DESC2,ACT_AMT2,ACT_WHETHER2,ACT_SCHEME_SNO,ACT_SPECIFICATIONS,ACT_RANGEPER from activity_master where ACT_SPECIFICATIONS like '%^%' and ACT_SCHEME in (^) and ACT_ACTION='E'

select stat_mast_id,stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_sno,stat_data_active from static_data_master,static_data where stat_data_id=stat_mast_id and stat_data_active='Y' and stat_data_id='^' and stat_data_desc='^'

select stat_mast_id,stat_data_desc, stat_data_desc1,stat_data_sno,stat_data_active from static_data_master,static_data where stat_data_id=stat_mast_id and stat_data_active='Y' and stat_data_id='^' and stat_data_desc1='^'
SELECT COUNT(1) as COUNT FROM APPINWARDREG WHERE TO_dATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN INWARD_CREATEDON AND ADD_MONTHS(INWARD_CREATEDON,3) AND INWARD_NO='^'
SELECT to_char(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as INWARD_CREATEDON,to_char(ADD_MONTHS(INWARD_CREATEDON,-3),'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENDDATE FROM APPINWARDREG WHERE INWARD_NO='^'
SELECT to_char(INWARD_CREATEDON,'DD/MM/YYYY') as INWARD_CREATEDON,to_char(ADD_MONTHS(INWARD_CREATEDON,3),'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENDDATE FROM APPINWARDREG WHERE INWARD_NO='^'
delete from AGR_ENWR where ENWR_APPLICATION_NO=? and ENWR_SNO=?

INSERT INTO AGR_ENWR (ENWR_SNO, ENWR_APPLICATION_NO, ENWR_PROPOSALNO, ENWR_DOI, ENWR_RECEIPT_NO, ENWR_VALIDUPTO,ENWR_CROPNAME,ENWR_GODOWNNUM,ENWR_NOOFPACKAGES,ENWR_NET_QTY,ENWR_ESTIMATEVALUE, ENWR_TOTALVALUE,ENWR_GODOWNNAME,ENWR_GODOWN_REGNO,ENWR_GODOWN_REG_DATE,ENWR_TOTALCAPACITY,ENWR_CAPACITY_UTILDT,ENWR_CITY,ENWR_DISTRICT,ENWR_STATE,ENWR_PLACE, ENWR_GODOWN_DISTANCE,ENWR_INSURANCENAME,ENWR_POLICY_NO,ENWR_POLICYDT,ENWR_AMT,ENWR_DUEDT,ENWR_CREATED_BY,ENWR_CREATED_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,to_Date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,to_Date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?, to_Date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?, to_Date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), ?,?,?,?,?,?,?, to_Date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,SYSDATE)

SELECT ENWR_SNO,TO_CHAR(ENWR_DOI,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_DOI,ENWR_RECEIPT_NO,TO_CHAR(ENWR_VALIDUPTO,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_VALIDUPTO,ENWR_CROPNAME,ENWR_GODOWNNUM,ENWR_NOOFPACKAGES,ENWR_NET_QTY,ENWR_ESTIMATEVALUE,ENWR_TOTALVALUE,ENWR_GODOWNNAME,ENWR_GODOWN_REGNO, TO_CHAR(ENWR_GODOWN_REG_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_GODOWN_REG_DATE,ENWR_TOTALCAPACITY,TO_CHAR(ENWR_CAPACITY_UTILDT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_CAPACITY_UTILDT ,ENWR_CITY,ENWR_DISTRICT,ENWR_STATE,ENWR_PLACE,ENWR_GODOWN_DISTANCE,ENWR_INSURANCENAME,ENWR_POLICY_NO, TO_CHAR(ENWR_POLICYDT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_POLICYDT ,ENWR_AMT,TO_CHAR(ENWR_DUEDT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ENWR_DUEDT,ENWR_LOANSANCTIONAMT,ENWR_CREATED_DATE,ENWR_CREATED_BY,ENWR_MODIFIED_BY,ENWR_MODIFIED_DT FROM AGR_ENWR WHERE ENWR_SNO='^' and ENWR_APPLICATION_NO='^'

select FACILITY_SNO,com_bankscheme,com_gecltype from FACILITIES f,facility_corp,com_otherdet o where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and f.facility_code=com_facid and com_bankscheme in ('074') and f.facility_code=o.facility_code
UPDATE AGR_ENWR set ENWR_LOANSANCTIONAMT=null where ENWR_APPLICATION_NO=? and ENWR_SNO=?
UPDATE AGR_ENWR set ENWR_LOANSANCTIONAMT=? where ENWR_APPLICATION_NO=? and ENWR_SNO=?
SELECT ENWR_SNO FROM AGR_ENWR WHERE ENWR_APPLICATION_NO='^'

select facility_headid, facility_id, to_char(facility_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_date, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_difference, facility_margin, facility_group, facility_desc, facility_category, facility_months, facility_interest, facility_application, facility_dp, facility_outstanding from facilities where facility_appno='^' and facility_sno = '^'

select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) as FACILITY_SANCAMT, FACILITY_CODE,COM_BANKSCHEME,PERAPP_CBSID from facilities,facility_corp,com_demographics,perapplicant where COM_FACID=FACILITY_CODE and COM_BANKSCHEME='074' and DEMO_APPNO=facility_appno and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CBSID='^' and facility_appno != '^' group by FACILITY_CODE,COM_BANKSCHEME,PERAPP_CBSID

select sum(FACILITY_SANCAMT) as FACILITY_SANCAMT,SUM(facility_proposed) AS facility_proposed, FACILITY_CODE,COM_BANKSCHEME,PERAPP_CBSID from facilities,facility_corp,com_demographics,perapplicant where COM_FACID=FACILITY_CODE and COM_BANKSCHEME='074' and DEMO_APPNO=facility_appno and DEMO_COMAPPNEWID=PERAPP_ID and PERAPP_CBSID='^' and facility_appno = '^' group by FACILITY_CODE,COM_BANKSCHEME,PERAPP_CBSID

select facility_appno, facility_headid, facility_id, borrower_id, to_char(facility_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as facility_date, facility_existing, facility_proposed, facility_difference,facility_margin, facility_sno,FAC_ROITYPE, COM_BANKSCHEME from facilities,facility_corp where facility_appno='^' and com_facid=facility_code
